comment: This professor has truly been the best instructor I have taken a course from at this university. Dr. DeWitt is exceptionally considerate of his students, which is evident in his teaching style and the feedback he provides on assignments. If this course is a requirement for you, I highly recommend Dr. DeWitt.

Heavy on homework but gives three weeks to do it. He is hands down the best professor at Kennesaw! I'll take him again for future classes! The class is easy if you stay on top of the work. I highly recommend him.

Dr.DeWitt is the BEST! As long as you read through his syllabus, read the textbook chapter assigned for ea module, and actively participate and you will be fine on tests! He is very organized and provides tons of copies of class readings/PPT lectures which is always nice and convenient! He also has a very quick response time which is great.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: Responsive, communicative professor. Instructions always clear but plenty of avenues available to ask for help/clarification if needed. The discussions & writing assignments (essays) are usually centered around current events, which keeps things relevant & engaging. Professor DeWitt is laid-back and fair. Every student is given a voice!

His class has lots of lectures which are easy to follow, as well as providing the powerpoints afterwards. As long as you pay attention and participate, his class is both fun and engaging. He's also very helpful if you have questions, and the final exam is a big group project that's manageable and relevant.
I loved Dr. Dewitt. His class is very organized and clear. If you like POL's you shouldn't have a problem taking this class. He is very helpful and knowledgable. I loved this class!!

He shows plenty of attention to each student's research design project(term paper) and follows up with you every step of the way. There was a mandatory phone call to discuss my progress on the term paper, which I was annoyed with since it was an online course, but the discussion actually helped quite a bit. Is a laxed grader if you just do the work

Professor DeWitt is a good professor. He has a tendency to use too many words when explaining assignments but will clarify anything. The class is mostly busy work with two discussions, one blog post, and one blog response a week. Very easy grader, as long as you do the work you get an A.

Wonderful professor, but very difficult course by nature, particularly online & over the summer. Be prepared to work. Few grades: discussions, policy memo, final research paper. However, Dewitt is very accessible, knowledgeable, and highly appreciates hard work, without criticism for "alternative" political opinions. Take him for any class you can!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Respected--Graded by few things

comment: I enjoyed his class very much! He cares for true learning, Assignments are based on really interesting readings, the class is all about analyzing real life researches and employing your writing skills on essays! He gave extra credit for both exams which I am grateful for since exams are actually quite difficult. Study hard for exams!!

You have a group research project that you work on throughout the semester. Assignments are fairly easy, but the tests are a little more difficult. Study and you will be fine! Professor DeWitt is very nice and always willing to help with whatever you need. This class can be somewhat difficult, but Professor DeWitt makes it easier!

He's very knowledgeable and passionate, which made class lectures enjoyable. 2 open-note exams, basic online assignments, group project, and a ton of extra credit opportunities. Textbook not that nec., but very helpful for exam prep. He truly appreciates hard work, and respects you as a student. Easily accessible, understanding, and overall great.

This class had a blog project throughout the semester and weekly discussion posts. There was a lot of writing involved but the work was super easy and so were the topics. Dr. DeWitt is a really easy grader and is very good at communicating due dates and answering questions. Overall he makes the class very easy to get through, would def take again.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Lots of homework--Clear grading criteria

comment: This class was extremely easy. There are discussions, one policy memo paper, and one research paper. Professor DeWitt is very helpful and does not mind explaining his directions if there is confusion. Easy A.

I took him over the summer and it was my favorite class out of the 3 I took. The course was clearly explained throughout the whole semester. Highly recommend doing the extra credit! It really helps out a lot and the professor really does try to help you out with your grade as long as you participate and put effort into the course.

The lecture notes were super easy to understand and straightforward, and he made them interesting as well. Really nice and super smart and cares a lot about everyone understanding the material and doing well. Hardly any homework, just three tests and a group debate and a policy memo paper
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Graded by few things--Group projects

comment: Dr. DeWitt is super laid-back and wants the best for his students. He provides LOTS of extra credit and study lists for his exams. Take advantage of both. His teaching is discussion-based, which makes class enjoyable and interesting. I gained a greater appreciation for the complexity of and hard work that goes into running the U.S. government.

Prof Dewitt is pretty laid back. Gives plenty of extra credit so take advantage of it. Participation is a grade and it helps. Attendance is not mandatory but he will take roll on occasion. I would've gotten an A but I didn't do all extra credit. Great teacher!

I took DeWitt's honors section of POLS 1101. Political science is something that I am extremely uninterested in; the thought of it makes me want to doze off. However, Dr. DeWitt made the subject bearable. He is very knowledgable and spices things up by relating what we learn to current events. He is also very generous with extra credit.

Dr. DeWitt is one of my favorite professors. Attendance isn't mandatory but it helps. There aren't many grades, but projects aren't hard and exams are fine if you go over the powerpoints. He isn't biased and he loves to have the class talk about current political issues.

Best professor I've had at KSU thus far. Completely understands everything he's talking about, has a passion for his job, and virtually unbiased. Lectures covered material on the tests, never opened the book. Three exams, one debate, and one policy memo with many extra credit opportunities. This was the most stress free class I had.

Favorite teacher at KSU. Challenges you, but in a way that you don't mind being challenged because of how relevant all the topics of the course work are. Makes you tie information learned to real-world topics. I've tried taking him every semester possible!!
easy grader on take home assignments, but the two tests are difficult. he mustve curved the final alot. there is a big group project and you have to use statistics software on the final

Attendance is not mandatory, but it is helpful to go to class. The lectures involve going over class powerpoints on the material in the textbook, but you don't have to read the textbook - there are no reading quizzes and you'll be fine if you just review the study list he gives out and the notes. Much of class is spent talking about current events.

I kept up with the readings and text book. Provided a study guide for the midterm and final. I completed the study guides and those alone were amazing in giving me an A. Group project that goes throughout most of the semester, but it is not bad. Promise! Great professor.

I really enjoyed his class. Dr. DeWitt is an awesome professor who seems to really care about you and passing his class. He is willing to help, and even offers extra-extra credit. I barely studied, just went to class & looked at the study guides, and got a high A on all the exams. He is a pretty easy grader, and the 3 exams are non-cumulative.
I love this guy! Take him if you get the chance. He's awesome.

Online courses are tough when it comes to communication and there were a few things that were not clear enough that left many of us guessing, but overall he was a great professor and did a great job at responding to emails.

Great guy good professor. Took Honors American Gov't and got A+. Tests are confusing but tons of extra credit (I got a 101.5, 91.5 and a 112 on 3 exams) he even offers a paper to bump your grade in the class 4pts at the end of the year. No idea whether he is DemRepublican after a whole semester, which is perfect for this very political class.

Kind of boring guy but its not entirely his fault the idea of teaching how to perform studies is boring. My only problem with him was the study guides are NOTHING like the test. He gives out a lot of extra credit especially if you do the readings. willing to help during office hours. Also part of your grade is class participation!!!

Great professor! Super intelligent and really enthusiastic about politics, but not bias at all. I was at every single class and heard every lecture and still not sure if he's a democrat or a republican. I won't say it's an easy class. I had to work for my A, but it's not impossible. He's clear with his expectations. Study hard and you're good.
DeWitt is very knowledge and a lenient teacher! He makes requirements crystal clear. 3 tests including final exam, also have a debate and policy memo presentation.

He is a great and easy professor. You can tell he is really interested in Politics but never shares his own opinion. I hate politics but I really liked his class. If you dont get an A you werent trying at all.

Good Professor, Easy Class. He gives a study guide for each of the 4 tests and if you know the info on them you should do fine. He posts power points and almost all the info are on them. Also there are a couple of essays and a debate. There was also a lot of extra credit.

Great professor!! He breaks everything down so it's easy to understand. Four tests, 2 essays and one debate. Attendance is extra credit and he offers other extra credit opportunities throughout the course. I would definitely recommend taking him!!!!

Dewitt is a great professor. He always explains things very clearly and is willing to repeat things/answer questions for students.  Does a good job of presenting information in an unbiased way also.  I highly recommend him, even if you're not into political science since he makes it interesting.

I'm not a fan of political science but he made it easy to understand the material. Do the study guide for tests and you'll be fine! He likes when people participate in class so don't be afraid to speak your mind. Good sense of humor and keeps up with current events. Very very helpful and nice :)

Dr. Dewitt is an AWESOME teacher!! TAKE HIM! Hes really easy & a very sweet guy. The tests were all easy and were all multiple choice. He gives you tons of extra credit opportunities. He also had two essays to write. I did work alot for this class, but you expect that for any college class. Definetly take him.

I thought Professor DeWitt was a pretty good teacher. The subject was hard and be prepared for a lot of work. I studied a lot and managed nothing more than a low B on all of the tests but combined with the other grades I ended up with a high B. For the subject I would say he was a good teacher especially because I've heard there are much worse!!!
This instructor covers a lot of material, but he makes it very interesting. Go to class, read the book, write the paper, get an A.
Horrible teacher! Expects too much from his students and very time consuming!

Professor Dewitt has been my favorite teacher at KSU. His class is interesting and fun. He gives you study guides before each test and online notes. There is no reason that anyone should not pass his tests. i would totally recommend him!

Research Methods is a hard class, but Prof Dewitt makes it so much easier than most Research Methods Profs.  He is helpful, fair, and offers extra credit assignments.  One group project and one individual short paper.  Mid term is mult. choice application questions and short essay.  Finals is same with the addition of basic stats.

This was an online class. He reqires a lot of reading in pols area which was often boring. There is a lot of writing involved (research design, memo and everything in between). There is also a presenation at the end. Be active on the disscussion board (at least 2 posts a week). He is very helpful if you have any questions. Very nice and smart perso

Study guides were useless, have no clue where the test questions came from.  Very hard tests and very unclear about what he is asking.  I pulled out a "c" from the extra credit...wouldnt recommend.  Take jones instead.
Great Teacher!  Explained things very clearly and was often available to help.  Extra Credit was available on every exam.  I would recommend the class to everyone :)
He is an awesome teacher.  Makes teaching interesting and engages students in thought-provoking conversation.  Great class overall.

He is simply cool. Relaxed, confident, calm. There is no wall to dealing with him, he is dead fair and while some assignments will be quite the labor, he will assist you. The class is not easy, but it's not hard either. Basically all your effort is appreciated and you will learn. And don't freak out if your midterm is low - he will EC you

Awesome teacher. Tests are straight from the notes and the book. Show up to class because discussions are always fun and intense. He is witty and makes the subject totally interesting, even though I loved it already. TAKE HIM!
great great great great teacher. i recommend no one else. very light studying, TONS of extra credit! TAKE HIM!!!

DeWitt is great. TAKE HIM! His tests and lectures are straightforward (and easy), and he makes even the boring topics interesting. I almost wish I was a Political Science major just so I could take him again. Seriously, take DeWitt; he makes the class so much fun.
He is a great teacher. Makes learning fun!
DeWitt is great. I'd take him again if I could. He'll definitely help you if you need it. If you go to class and take fairly good notes, then the tests are a breeze. I really enjoyed his class.
I love DeWitt!  He's so adorable, for some reason.  Quiet, reasonable, and clearly intelligent.  The class is pretty straight-forward.

good professor. he always started class discussions and got everyone involved. i missed one of the tests cause i didnt feel like going to class, only to look at my schedule 20 minutes after class started to see we had a test. i told him i got in a car wreck and he let me take it after class the next week! sorry professor dewitt :(
He'll give you a second chance and a good grade!
research methods is a horrible class, so boring; but dewitt is a good guy, met him at my work and was pretty cool.  think he'd be better for other classes
Cool teacher, A little vague about 1 assignment.  Overall, good guy.  10-15 page paper due, but there is plenty of time.  take home final, and in class midterm...debates are easy.
Great teacher.  He is fun and interesting, and funny.  He's into Jon Stewart and other nightly television hosts.  Get this guy, he rocks, will also work with you for a grade.

Love this guy, and I have to admit that I have a crush on him. He is the coolest, and so funny. He expects you to put in some effort, but is totally reasonable. I wish he taught all of my classes, I just like looking at him and listening to him.
Research methods is a horribly boring class, but some how DeWitt makes it fun.  He grades easy, but his two tests are hard.  There is also a group project that makes up a big percent of your grade.

DeWitt is a great professor...I would take him for all of my classes if I could.  He has a great sense of humor and encourages student participation.  His tests are straight from the study guide and notes and he offers extra credit.  Take him if you can...it is worth it!
He was so monotone and boring.   He gives a lot of chances for extra credit.  His tests are hard but they are multiple choice with 2 extra credit essays.  He is okay.

Prof DeWitt is extremely laid back. He makes the class as interesting as possible and encourages class participation. He provides study guides for the 3 tests and they are fairly easy tests. The final is simply the 3rd test which covers only the last part of the semester. Come to class, listen and take notes, and you'll do fine.
The best way to describe Dr. Dewitt is just cool like ice.  Intelligent, willing to help, couldn't ask for a better professor.
Professor DeWitt is a fantastic teacher.  He is fair, and if you go to class, you will do well on his tests.  He gives you every opportunity to do well in his class, I would highly recommend him.

I really enjoyed his class. He made it interesting. He gave extra percentage points extra credit by posting discussions on webct. I bombed the first test, & ended up making a B in the class. I'd definitely recommend him.
TAKE HIM! he is such a great teacher! His tests are in depth but if you go to class and study your notes you will be just fine. He is so nice and helpful!

His tests are HARD! There are two tests and then a final...and those are the only grades that you have. No homework, quizzes, or attendance grades. He is willing to help, very personable, and funny but the tests are hard.
Great professor!! Has great attitude all the time and is always smiling. Teaches material very well and tests on what her goes over in class, no suprises.

Dr. DeWitt is an awesome professor & person. I highly reccommend this professor. He takes time to explain whatever is confusing you about the material & more than willing to work with you if you have personal issues going on as long as you let him know what the case is. He's a true credit to the POLI SCI Dept. Take notes and read you'll do fine.

He is a great teacher and makes his classes a pleasure to attend. Easy going and willing to help with any issues which is great, considering some of the material was a little perplexing. His tests are fair and if you apply yourself you can get a high grade without frustration. All in all an asset to kennesaw. Keet it up dr dewwit :)

Research methods is naturally boring, but he invites discussion and uses real-life examples to keep things fun.  The textbook he uses is very good and humerous.  Very fair grader.  Ample extra credit opportunities.  He can be a little vague at times though.

Great prof- totally recommend.  His tests were a little more challenging than we'd expected... don't expect an automatic A; but he's great at giving extra credit, and is very willing to help.  We got in to really interesting discussions, and somehow he wove research methods in to them- great at making dry info very interesting/ gets class involved.
Great teacher.  Gives paralells to current events for examples.
He is awesome! He makes the class fun, gives lots of extra credit and his tests are right on with the study guide! Take him!

He is an excellent professor.  He gives you extra credit that is added to your FINAL grade.  He gives you extra credit on exams.  His study guides are right on the mark.  He is fair and makes the class interesting.  I would recommend him to anyone.
Dr Dewitt rocks. He gives extra credit all the time. You have 3 tests that make up 100% of your grade. Attendace optional but is recommended but his lectures are fun and he lets you out early
He is one of the best politcal science professors that is clear and there is no surprises with him.  Above all this, he is very handsome and smart!  Loved his class!
